subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan made his official debut for Bayern Munich, entering in the 67th minute of a 5-1 victory at Stuttgart in a German Cup match. On loan from the Los Angeles Galaxy, Donovan replaced Luca Toni and narrowly missed scoring one minute into his debut. Donovan, who scored four goals in five exhibition matches during the winter break, hopes for a permanent transfer to Bayern.
